title: Categorize Image: Overlay Type
description: Select the category that best describes this image:

options.name: Contains text overlay
options.description: The photo has a text overlay, either typed or handwritten.

options.name: Contains graphics overlay
options.description: The photo has a graphics overlay with no discernible text.

options.name: Contains both text and graphics overlays
options.description: The photo one more more text overlays AND one ore more graphics overlays.
